text: == Events == * January 8 - The Jesuit educational plan known as the Ratio Studiorum is issued. * June 20 - The Synod of Diamper is convened. * August 15 - First Battle of Curlew Pass: Irish forces defeat the English. * September 21 - The first reported performance of Shakespeare's Julius Caesar at the Globe Theatre in London, is recorded by Swiss traveller Thomas Platter the Younger. * * October 18 - Battle of Sellenberk: Michael the Brave, Prince of Wallachia, defeats the army of Andrew Báthory near Șelimbăr, leading to the first recorded uniting of the Romanians.
